analysis.description:
Reentrancy in IkuraStorage.addTokenBalance (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol#542-557):
	External calls:
	- tokenBalances[addr] > 0 && ! isOwnerAddress(addr) (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol#553-555)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ownerAddresses (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol#554-555)

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.13', '^0.4.23']
	- /unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol#15-17 declares pragma solidity^0.4.23
	- /unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol#89 declares pragma solidity^0.4.13

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol#15-17): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/44/0x6cd30c3964d04adcfc6a2a3b6031e21d94d3d91f.sol#89): it allows old versions
